Find at least three representative survey papers on LLM agents on Google Scholar, and add their titles to the Notes.

---

### Thought ###
To find three representative survey papers on LLM (Large Language Model) agents, I will use Google Scholar. The process involves opening the Google Scholar website, searching for "survey papers on LLM agents," and identifying three relevant papers. Once identified, I will add their titles to the Notes app. 

### Plan ###
1. Open the Chrome browser.
2. Navigate to Google Scholar by searching for "Google Scholar" or directly entering its URL.
3. Search for "survey papers on LLM agents."
4. Identify three representative survey papers and note their titles.
5. Open the Notes app and add the titles of the selected papers.

### Current Subgoal ###
Open the Chrome browser.
